name: Anathema Tower Defense
description:
A wicked curse has taken over the land, corrupting all life and commanding it as its own. Construct towers, arm your Hero and design a combination of defenses capable of holding back the tide in this Action Tower Defense game.


Combine up to 10 different Towers on the battlefield to drive the enemy back, with multiple options for defense, offense, economy. Upgrade these towers to further specialize them, or to improve their versatility.


Choose 2 from a total of 9 weapons to fight directly with your Hero, with each having their own fighting style. Fight from a distance, up close and personal, focus on dealing damage or providing defense and utility for your allies.


Experience the traditional Tower Defense gameplay in the Classic gamemode, defeating increasingly powerful enemy waves while making sure you do not run out of lives.


Fight through a gruesome tug-of-war in the Breakthrough gamemode, gaining more and more territory as you and your allies push back the enemy, until you finally reach and destroy the enemy base.


Further customize your playstyle by selecting from 4 actives and 8 passives to bring to the battlefield to improve your Hero in different ways, from mobility to combat stats to improving nearby towers, choose the skills that best complement your strategy.
